column1: Art Institute of Chicago////It's definitely a top-notch museum considering its size
column2: scope and collection. Â There are quite a number of classic pieces here that hundreds of people have already mentioned. There's a lot of great stuff
column3: but there's also a lot of stuff that I don't really dig at all
column4: such as some of the impressionism
column6: and some of the ridiculous modern works.
